name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft.,  Passive Perception 14

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-­foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
